question: In a single contour line, at any point the elevation is ____
Which of the following is false?

answers.a: No two lines meet on intersect each other in any case
answers.b: If the contour lines are at very large distance to each other, this indicates a gentle slope
answers.c: If the closed lines have higher elevation in the center then it represents the hill or mountain
